I've been thinking of buying an SLR for ages now. I wasn't quite convinced with the D3100 or the D5100, but when I read reviews of this camera I knew this is what I wanted. If you are a novice like me, but interested in a DSLR, this is a great fit. Its a brilliant camera, with enough features and options to ensure even as I improve as a photographer, I won't need to consider an upgrade. For a powerful camera, it is also ridiculously easy to use with lots of great options to allow a novice to get professional shots.Ever since the camera was launched, I've been keeping an eye out on all the listed retailers and other online sites. Flipkart was not only the first one to offer it, but also the only one to place so much importance on customer service. I wrote in to check if the camera could be delivered a day early, since I was travelling on the expected date of delivery and was eager to play around with it before I left. They wrote back saying they'd try but it was unlikely. And then surprised me by delivering it 3 days early!All in all, a great buy. Its easy to use, powerful, and has inbuilt effects which are easy to figure and yield great shots. The lens included is a great start (although one would need to buy a zoom lens eventually and a uv filter separately), the included bag appears to be of decent quality. All in all: a good buy

This camera is one of the best entry level DSLRs out there. The image quality is just mesmerizing! And the low light auto focusing is pretty decent as well. Honestly, I was always a Nikon fan because Canon cameras tend to lack image quality. And this was my poison. Great product from Nikon. This is a outstanding upgrade over the previous Nikon D5100. 9 cross point AF! It's way more easy to focus on moving subjects. And the ISO performance is awesome. The only cons I've noticed is that it's not weather sealed and hence not suitable for using in the rain or stuff. And it doesn't have a focus motor. But that's not really an issue because most lenses today have built-in AF motors. People out there looking for an entry level DSLR with a budget of 50k, go for this! It's quite undoubtedly the best option.
Great camera Nikon D 5200 with18-105 lens

Camera General- Bought from Snapdeal (Order number 2559904891) with 105 lens as didnot wish to change lenses frequently purely for personal interests. Pros- Great PQ, Cons- Bty life is average- appx 250 pics in a period of 3 days. - Lens is heavy. - Camera bag provided looks cheap. - Even the strap looks cheap with the logo pasted on it. - Packing was average.Camera is strongly recommended.Snapdeal- -Got it cheaper than other sites.-But got only 1 week return policy.Other site offers 1 month return.-Warranty offered was 2 years- but the warranty card mentioned only 1 year.-Snapdeal took one month and five reminders and finally telephonically convinced that the product will be taken care for two years.No written documents to support.-The product was dispatched by some different sellers name than that I had selected after paying a premium (as per seller rating).- Refused to entertain my review!!! even after five attempts.-Think if you want to save a thousand ruppes or need peace of mind.
